address: 253 5th Ave, New York, NY 10016, United States
name: John Doe Bar & Kitchen

reviews.review: Stopped in for late night drinks and a lil snack. They have your standard bar menu with great service and a fun vibe!

Buck a shuck every day from 11am to 8pm- no lie!  Definitely add this place to your happy hour tour!  The oysters were shucked perfectly, fresh and COLD, exactly what you want.  Pretty sure it was a blend of different types, guessing that's
This is a really good places in NY. The food was great and they even had good prices
Phenomenal bar and staff! A great spot to head either by myself or with friends. The ambiance is perfect and the beer always fresh and cold. A 5th avenue staple!
Burgers are out if this world!!!
Food and beer were good, wait staff very nice but pricy. They charged $4 for one half of a roll and some butter. I figured it would be a basket of bread but it was simple white bread roll toasted.
Good service. Nice view outside at chairs on ESB.
Food here is always good. Try the Oysters !
Honestly, just ok. Had some wings and drinks, nothing spectacular.
Great beer on tap walked up and down 5th Ave (and around) looking for nyc spots with good local beer on tap. This one was one of the best. Great appetizers too and service was 5*!
The person who served the bar was very attentive, very nice atmosphere
Good food and beer.
Friendly staff, good beer, not a large variety of selection, but the "John Doe" beers are good quality at an excellent price. If you want to take a break and have a beer come here.
Great food
Had a lovely brunch.  Service was great.

Went there for drinks after some shopping on a sunday afternoon, great service with a very attentive but not pushing waitress, large and pleasant terrace and they have happy hours up to 8pm . Defo recommend
Had a slice of delicious melt in your mouth apple pie with ice cream.
It's a great placeOysters!!!are always fresh!!!
Chill atmosphere, awesome Irish pub. Decent happy hour specials and pub food.
The Best Staff!!! Warm & Welcoming!

My friends and I happened to find this place looking for a quick bite to eat before going to Museum of Sex for my birthday, which was just a minute walk away!(so convenient). Amazing cocktails for amazing prices especially considering the
Great happy hour and dollar oysters!

Great place to enjoy a nice cold craft beer. I ordered a Heineken beer. The menu looks delicious. I plan to  have a burger or fish and chips on my return visit.  Especially,  since they have a good selection of Jameson whiskey on the menu.
Pleasant visit had a good cold Heineken. Have a friend who work here. Food menu look delicious. Have good Jameson IPA shots for $ 5.
Excellent food and great staff
Amazing and fast service. Great cocktails. Awesome weekly specials. Ambience is cozy. Food is hit or miss
Fantastic service, we sat outside it was really nice. The food quality and prices are very reasonable and we really enjoyed our dinner. Would definitely go there again!
Just went for a drink and an app. Had the buffalo chicken flatbread and it was amazing.
The Buffalo wings and mozzarella sticks were delicious. The drinks were okay. The service was great. I would return to try different drinks.
Sliders hit the spot and service was great
$1 oysters all day everyday are the best$1 wings on Wednesday is a mustI am a fan
Fun little dive
Great pub, nice folks!!
Arrived 30 minutes before closing time was still allowed to order food & drinks.

This place was an accidental discovery.  Beautiful day in the city wanted a drink and stopped in.  The cocktails were really good and their craft beer was just as good maybe better.  Food, although i was just eating small every dish seen
Very friendly atmosphere. Great food.
Good place, nice staff, quick drinks, good food
$1 oysters  and  great steak!
is this the hacker man from roblox making a restaurant.no wonder why there haven't been any hackings recently!good god!
The food is delicious and there are great specialty cocktails for all tastes but best of all is the amazing hospitality provided by the staff
Absolutely fresh, succulent, briney, sweet, creamy and did I say fresh? dozen of Oysters  nowhere on 5th ave does it better than John Does yessirski
Excellent service

Just moved to the area and have found my go-to breakfast joint.  It's like "Cheers"; only without the extreme alcohol consumption, and the back and forth of Sam and Diane. I love that they all know my name and even remember my dog's too. It isn't quite Mama's, but doesn't have the line or wait either.

The food was quite delicious and service was excellent.  Ambience was very nice too.  I even got an Irish song sung to me by a fellow sitting outside with his dog.  I was too taken aback by the fact I was clearly being romanced, but I will be back for everything this place has to offer.  Hopefully so will he :)
great tastes and services... I left quite full and happy alongside craving for more frequent visits...
Great Service ! Micheal was great per usual! Thanks Donna !
VEGGIE Burger with chedder cheese cooked perfectly, tasted great. Fries were awesome too! I'll be back!Staff, great!

Great brunch option supplied through Pulsd. The mimosas were very strong and plentiful. They had omelettes which were pretty big for the area competition; overall portions were big actually. I love how much care is put into things here:
one of the best meal i've ever have
Loved the customer service and the food was delicious. They also had a beautiful chill  ambience. Even through this scary day they made it peaceful. Definitely will be coming be back

This is absolutely one of the tastiest place to eat in the area. Every time I go there I am absolutely satisfied. They preserve their high  standard service and the highest level of cooking  they offer. You will be always satisfied with this restaurant. Highly  recommended.
Great food, great service,  clean place!
Nice people
Great experience.  Warm friendly staff.
$1 oysters great service
Great burgers, fast service
The food was good
Great service!!!
Best hidden secret in Manhattan
The service was excellent and food was great.

The staff there is really wonderful I always have a great time whenever I go there. Michael is a great bartender hes always serving you with a smile even though hes wearing a mask you can tell hes always happy to be there. I think they
One of my hang out spot, nice server but snotty manager.
Absolutely top notch service & the entire menu is truly delicious.... I definitely would recommend to anyone....If your not in the area , it's worth a trip..

Love this place. So glad they are open right in the heart of Flatiron. Amazing food and people.  The staff really know how to pour a drink. Frozen margaritas will really start you off nicely.  Food is so amazing - try the wings :)
Its homey. Very friendly staff. Easonable price. Great beer selection

Ambiance is nice, and they were playing a soccer game on their TV, which my husband enjoyed. However, I ordered a regular burger and said I wanted it well done. The burger arrived and whatever the meat was certainly wasnt beef. Ive had

I would give it zero stars if I could. Cute place however very unfriendly staff. Blonde woman bartender in a bad mood and horrible attitude! We asked for bar menu and asked about specials she slams the menus down and continues conversation
Great food, decent micro micro brew selection, attentive service, clean simple decor.
Visiting from Oklahoma.  Delicious and great service!Update: came back again and tried the oysters and they're to die for. Joshua and Miro are awesome.
Great bar
Was searching for a happy hour and found it! Tuesday is $5 tacos, $5 tequila shots. Wednesday $1 wings $5 beers. $1 fresh blue point oysters all the time. Bar staff is top notch.
We want there because it was just round the corner from our hotel. It had a great atmosphere, great range of drinks and craft beer and good bar food. It isn't cheap but a fun night
Good food good beer
Awesome service.. Perfect low key bar/cafe.. had myself the breakfast burger... washee it down with a hot toddy...bomb.com
There food was good and the were sufficient.  I had the Penne also Vodka with an added side of chicken.  The chicken was scarce.  The salmon was also delicious.
Good quality food and service. My fussy preferences were looked after without missing a beat.
House of over priced hamburger. Big bun small burger charge extra1.50 for cheese on your cheese burger and 1.50 for every topplng. Not worth the money.
It's a nice place to go with friends and do an after office. Not recommended for family
Fun little pub, but barely reminiscent of anything Irish. Not enough stouts of porters on the menu.
Not bad.
I live for Taco Tuesdays! Great place!!
Wonderful!!!!! The best IPA I tried in a long time
Love this place, a neighborhood gem. Try that autumn fennel, one of the best gin cocktail around.
Excellent place to enjoy a good wine on Fifth Avenue.
Good food, attentative service. Reasonably priced.
Great spot that is travelor friendly - abundance of regular and USB plugs, wifi, all the great normal bar food with surprisingly good healthy options as well.  All staff act like family owners too.

Great bar / pub restaurant in the nomad area, very warm and Home + very friendly service, very good homemade hamburger meat or veggie, wraps .... the waitress speaks some French, very friendly, I recommend this place.

Great little spot on the main drag that we stumbled into to have a pint. Bartender was super friendly, a lad fresh from the Eire with less than two years under how belt in America.. Made you feel welcome. Decor was great for the holidays. I went with a Sweet Tarts Cape Cod Cranberry sour, which wasn't as sour as I would have liked.
Great food, super friendly and fun service, can only be recommended!

Great Little Place for Drinks and a Bite ! We Only Stopped in for a Few Drinks after Dinner and Before Our City Christmas Lights Tour. Food smelled great and we will certainly return. Service was great and the place had a great vibe.
Nice buffalo wrap. Good service at the bar.
It's ok
Good place
A great place.  Really good food,  friendly staff.  Enjoy a pint of Guinness.
Nice cozy and warm bar in a great location in Manhattan. Good deals at happy hour too!
Good local
Very warm and welcoming location, friendly staff, fast service, good quality food, fair price
Good place for a happy hour with friends.
Yummy food and a fun atmosphere. Loved the Brussel sprouts!
Great place. Awesome staff. Good food.
Nice place!!!
Good music positive vibes. Quick mother son dinner well spent.
Beautiful interior and great atmosphere. But drinks were pretty expensive, even for nyc.
Great beer good staff
Very cozy, high paced atmosphere. Packed and loud friday night, grate place to discharge after long work week. Pleasant server and good food. Also, oysters were on point :-)
Amazing servir and good food
Silly expensive, kinda shabby.

Quiet on a Sunday night and quick and pleasant service as a result. Steak was brilliant... Cooked perfectly and so tender... Burger looked good too and after a long day stomping the sidewalks whilst jet lagged, this was exactly what we needed before bed.
Best Sliders!

It was good for the most part. Cant beat $1 Wing wednesday and $1 oysters. Ordered Old bay seasoning with a side of fries, very good. Definitely a pub/divey vibe, can get very loud. But deceptively spacious, can easily fit 150 people.
Cool spot we stumbbled upon alot of beverages to choose from
Top, very good PuB.We are French, and we came across it by chance, very good service and welcome (Sabina). The food was very good and good value for the 5th Avent of New York. And
Small, great atmosphere. VC very good food and a fantastic bartender from Ireland. What more could you ask for?
Loud young loud young...
Local beer, fresh food, happy people! To try, it's so good!
Wonderful spot and our host/server was the best. We will definitely be back. Oh and taco Tuesday the chicken and battered cod tacos were amazing
Lovely atmosphere and great food , staff were very friendly,
Great place
Good drinks, alright bar food I can't complain I enjoyed myself
Nice ambience
PUB Excellent in the NOMAD area - Dark wooden room Excellent Beers and varied food to be a Pub
Excellent
Great place for a business lunch. Diverse food options, and great service.
Pulled pork is moist and flavorful. The fries are the right amount of crispy. I eat their meal pal lunches all the time.
Half and half chicken curry is superb
Got food poisoning from their nachos
Best Turkey Bacon club I have had in ages, plus lots of beer on tap
Low key bar. Good service and happy hour til 8p. We usually go after work and can easily find a table for groups of about 6.
Nice vibe. Oysters lacked taste but good chicken wings.

Good little bar for an invigorating meal at the end of the day. It has interesting craft beers (avoid the sweet baby jesus that smells of praline and is disgusting, the Radiant pig saved the robot (it does not invent
Great atmosphere for a local experience. Service was awesome and fun.
Excellent place! Good prices, good drinks, good food, great happy hour! Not crowded and outdoor seating! Tables and booths available! Service is great!
Adequate attention
Service was horrible.
Always a great place to visit while in NYGreat staff .good food and wonderful atmosphereHighly recommended
Great pulled pork sandwich
very bad pleaseclose to earlythe drinks very,very badbetter drink water.
Best lunch spot in da area

I stumbled across this place at 10:30pm, im writing this sitting in the front window, the night before world pride and the place is empty. Despite being decked out like a unicorn vomited rainbows, the bar man is sexy as hell (and lovely)...
Awesome vibes! Reasonably priced! They give away food at the end of the night! Ask for Shantel! Best bartender here

Me and my friends absolutely loved this place.Good music, good drinks and good dishes.It's open pretty late which is a BIG plus so if you're looking for a place open after a night on the town I highly recommend this one.
Ellie is proper class
Great value at Happy hour and a lovely waitress !   Definitely one to visit.
Good food, good ales not just beers, good location near by empire state building, if you want a warm welcome and a place to escape the rat race, call in
cool, cozy local, friendly staff and beer tasting possible. Hammer bar / restaurant.
Was there on brunch. The hangover burger was very nice, and at a great price it included a drink or beer. Good bloody mary and mimosa.
I had the fish&chips, fish was tasty (including a delicious dill sauce) fries could have been a little crispier. The drinks were very nice!
Their appetizer is huge. Good place to drink matches.
This place is like home,  if you're home had beer taps and people happy to see you
Very friendly and not very expensive! Nice to see the games and chat with friends
Great service. Wings are tops!
Very tasty chicken buffalo and French onion soup.
Come in for a beer while walking by, very nice place! Great atmosphere, staff is friendly, great tap selection, menu looks promising. Got the Baykeeper IPA, cold fresh and delicious!
Great low key, relaxing xx friendly bar
Attentive servers, awesome food, good beers.
Not very friendly staff. Customers having only beer probably aren't good enough...
Love there food
Nice place, good Dinner
Nice place at the center of Manhattan.
Sinead  the bartender is  great, friendly attentive.  Would totally recommend this place.
Amazing BLT and great service
Tasty beer and whiskey may taste. Nice bar lady Chantal, Donna and Sinnead

So I usually get water when I drink but our bar tender sharande was amazing when you asked for lemon water it was actual lemon water food is sweet and tasty too enjoy this casual hot spot. Trust me you won't doubt going here and if you do reply to me so I can hear your story.

A great place to stop after work. Great choices for food, although the salad selection is great, there's not much else for say a vegan or vegetarian meal.  But the service is excellent and drinks are great.  It's a good pitstop.
Great place

What a great midtown location for this gem!!! Properly poured pints of the good stuff (Guinness) as well as attentive staff and mellow vibe. The perfect lowkey place on 5th that you didn't know you needed!
Overpriced. It's a great place if you want to overpay for an irish dive bar.
My local pub.  Great happy hour.
Awesome food, staff and drinks
Best food Ive had in NYC! Real authentic Irish food, and the curry fries are to die for...it was a real home comfort, prices are very good too!
Love the people and the atmosphere

I visited this place 2 times and both times the food was ridiculously terrible. Old, tasteless and mostly cold. They didnt even bother to make it correctly. Customer service was by far the worst, the lady gave us attitude when asked what

Service was amazing. I came here with a group of coworkers for happy hour one day. We were all trickling in a few at a time, we weren't really sure how many there would be total, typical large party annoyances. The servers and manager
The food here is so good but what's even better are the fabulous people that work there and their yummy drinks!
Great food good beer great atmosphere
Extremely nice bar! Have Delicious oysters and deal on it! Drinks are great, looks very cozy and excellent service!

Came in for lunch on a Wednesday soon after opening.  Bartender was super friendly but overall not the best.  Wednesday is $1 wings.  Not sure if it is because it got busy or they had too many orders but the wings were very subpar.
Friendly bartenders! Always great playlist
